titles.title: Make Me A Son, O God, Make Me A Son

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Make me a son, O God, make me a son.
Whatever You do, deal with me, Lord, as a son.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When I was younger I would gird myself
And would go wherever I wanted to.
But now, I'm older, and I stretch out my hands and cry,
And I cry...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I thank Christ Jesus our Lord and King
Who hath enabled me, for that He counts me faithful,
Putting me into His service, who was not one of His
Yet I cry...
